DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza la información existente en D_CATEGORIA. */ UPDATE D_CATEGORIA SET de_categoria = w_t703_desc FROM AS400.HOST03.SMPDATD.T703FCATE A INNER JOIN D_CATEGORIA P ON (A.w_t703_cate=P.id_categoria) where w_t703_desc COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AI<>de_categoria
/* Inserta la información faltante en D_CATEGORIA. */ -- id_grupo_especialidad se coloca en F/D, para luego revisar INSERT INTO D_CATEGORIA (id_categoria, de_categoria,id_grupo_categoria) SELECT w_t703_cate as id_categoria, w_t703_desc as de_categoria, 2 as id_grupo_categoria from AS400.HOST03.SMPDATD.T703FCATE WHERE w_t703_cate not in (SELECT id_categoria FROM D_CATEGORIA)
